ygData.subject: Antiqued Silver Band [*Spoiler*]
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone have any more detailed info on this ring?  The only info I managed to get was this, off of EQ lizer: These magical rings can be foud off the second
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone have any more detailed info on this ring? The only info I
managed to get was this, off of EQ'lizer:

"These magical rings can be foud off the second Shadowknight in
Befallen. They grant +2 armor class."

I was just curious if there's anything else special about it, aside
from the increase in AC -- an NPC offered to buy it for 4platinum, I
believe, as opposed to the 1platinum offered for a Cutthroat Dervish
Ring.

Thanks in advance, for any help.

Erdrick, The Regulators
www.theregulators.org
(Rallos Zek)
